Songwriting and Lyrics: As one of U2's primary songwriters (alongside The Edge), Bono possesses an exceptional gift for crafting memorable, impactful lyrics that resonate with listeners worldwide

CLUE: Former name of Ho Chi Minh City
FOUND IN: Saigon served as the capital of South Vietnam during the latter half of the Vietnam War and remained so after reunification until being renamed to honor the revolutionary leader, Ho Chi Minh.
